alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Henry (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:02PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Henry and southeastern Fulton Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 501 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wauseon to near Mcclure to near Holgate. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Napoleon, Wauseon, Swanton, Delta, Liberty Center, Holgate, Mcclure, Metamora, Hamler, Texas, Malinta, Florida, Pettisville, Brailey, Grelton, Gerald, Winameg, Assumption, Colton and Tedrow. This includes Interstate 80 in Ohio between mile markers 28 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
